mapper.select: SELECT no, id, title, contents, writedate, hit FROM( SELECT LEVEL, no, id, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1))||title as title, contents, writeDate, nvl(readNo, 0) as hit, pno, depth, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM( SELECT b.no, id, title, contents, to_char(writeDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') writeDate, h.readNo, nvl(rpl.pno, 0) as pno, nvl(rpl.depth, 0) as depth FROM board b LEFT JOIN Hits h ON b.no = h.no LEFT JOIN reply rpl ON b.no = rpl.no ) START WITH pno=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR no=pno ORDER SIBLINGS BY no desc ) WHERE RNUM > #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}
